name: Heat Wave
description: You exhale a wave of hot breath in a 30ft. circle, centered on you. Creatures caught in the area must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 2d8 + MOVE fire damage on failure, or half as much on a success. If the creature fails the save by 5 or more, it is burned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
